room_title: Escape room "Judgment" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: Went with some coworkers and had a blast in The Judgement room. Levi was awesome all the workers were super nice! Would defiantly recommend Springfield Escape Room to friends. Thank you so much for a great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Judgment" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: It was so much fun! Levi was a great game host. We did the judgement scenario and escaped! It was tough. We will definitely be back to do the other ones.

room_title: Escape room "Judgment" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
review: Recently experienced the Judgment, it was such a fun and rewarding room. Escaped with five seconds to spare, which felt pretty amazing. You'll seriously need to check this place out.
